Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I am an photgrapher and novice ice climber. During the warmer months here in Montreal, I enjoy mountain hiking of Mont Tremlant, free climbing, and running.

When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows, I am an aspiring chef, and I spend a large amount of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the full Stack web development world and Data Analysis.
